name: Aerial Battle: Helicopter Game
description:
Aerial Battle is a game based on some classic titles, your mission is to complete all levels in the adventure mode, also it has the arcade mode to compete with your friend for the higher possible score!

Swipe your screen to control your helicopter, get several new weapon to battle a lot of automated machines that want to destroy a very peaceful world, this is a very hard game, so want to give it a try?
